name: Zero G (Joelzilla)
description:
Get to the escape pod before the ship explodes! The artificial gravity has shut-down, every move must be considered. You don't want to be left floating in the void of space now do you? 

In this 2d retro pixel-art puzzler you must escape the ship before it's too late. Unfortunately for you, it's easier said than done.

Made by working a few hours every day in October for the Devtober 2020 game jam. 

Version 1.0.
